import {Outlet, Link, useNavigate} from "react-router-dom"; import {useSignOut} from "react-auth-kit"; import {useState} from "react"; const Layout = () => { const logout = useSignOut(); const nav = useNavigate(); let cookie = document.cookie; const [username, setUsername] = useState('') let auth = false let href = '' if(cookie) { const token = cookie.split(';')[3] if(token) { const _auth = token.split(':')[1] console.log(_auth) if(_auth) { auth = true console.log(_auth.slice(3, _auth.length - 4)) } } } const signOut = () => { logout() nav('/') } return ( <>
